dialogue.content: I'm supposed to monitor my blood pressure at home, but I'm inconsistent.
What gets in the way-forgetting, time, or the process itself?
Forgetting, mostly. I remember for a week and then stop.
Got it. Do you want a very simple routine or something more detailed?
Simple. I just want it to happen without thinking.
Understood. When would it fit best-morning, evening, or both?
Okay. We'll anchor it to your evening routine.
If I could measure consistently in the evening for a month, I'd feel much more in control.
